find_package(GLEW REQUIRED)

set(GAME_ENGINE_INCLUDE ${GAME_ENGINE_INCLUDE} ${GLEW_INCLUDE_DIR} PARENT_SCOPE)

set(GLEW_IS_STATIC OFF CACHE BOOL "Set to ON if GLEW is linked as a static library")
if (${GLEW_IS_STATIC})
    set(GAME_ENGINE_DEFINITIONS ${GAME_ENGINE_DEFINITIONS} -DGLEW_STATIC PARENT_SCOPE)
endif()

if (WIN32)
  set(GAME_ENGINE_DEP_LIBS ${GAME_ENGINE_DEP_LIBS} ${GLEW_LIBRARIES} glu32.lib opengl32.lib PARENT_SCOPE)
else()
  set(GAME_ENGINE_DEP_LIBS ${GAME_ENGINE_DEP_LIBS} ${GLEW_LIBRARIES} GLU GL PARENT_SCOPE)
endif()
